name: Sorting Battle
description:
A puzzle game about using your mouse to move number blocks around and identifying lines sorted in ascending or descending order. In other words, a game about sorting!

This project is an open-source game project. You can find its GitHub repository here. Feel free to contribute!

Controls
  • LMB (Left Mouse Button): Hold and drag to select number blocks. Release to clear number blocks (if you selected at least 3)
  • RMB (Right Mouse Button): Hold and drag to move number blocks. Release to stop.
  • You can click the "PUSH" button to add a new row of 4 numbers to your board, from below. Alternatively the Spacebar works as well.
